\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage[english]{babel}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\begin{document}
\begin{center}
{\text{If} $\mathfrak{p}$ \text{is a prime ideal in the factor basis, then} $\mathrm{vlog} \left( \mathfrak{p}^{\sigma} \right) = \zeta \mathrm{vlog} \left( \mathfrak{p} \right) $}
\end{center}
\end{document}
